WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-EAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 18 JAN
   BY M/V HAI YANG SHI YOU 720 TOWING TEN
   11500 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   20-35.40S 039-16.00W, 20-38.23S 038-58.98W,
   20-14.21S 038-54.50W, 20-11.38S 039-11.48W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 19 JAN 21.
